alert.note: Alert for Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May; Cumberland (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 31 at 2:06AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Areas of Dense Fog Overnight... An area of low clouds accompanied by fog is lifting northward across the Delmarva Peninsula as of 2 AM. Some visibility down to 1/4 mile has been observed to the south around Salisbury and Cambridge, Maryland. Visibility as low as 1/4 mile may reach Kent County, Delaware, and possibly up to far southern New Jersey through 6 AM. Use caution when traveling overnight into the early morning hours on Tuesday from the eastern shore of Maryland to southern Delaware and southern New Jersey. Reduce your speed if you encounter fog.

area.areaDesc: Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May; Cumberland
